casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Cross-Appellant, v. Sutton, Cross-Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Sutton, 128 Ohio St.3d 351, 2011-Ohio-736.]

(No. 2008-1996 Submitted February 16, 2011 Decided February 22, 2011.) William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Kristen L. Sobieski, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for cross-appellant. Paul Mancino Jr., for cross-appellee.

{¶ 1} Sua sponte, this cause is no longer held for the decision in 2009-0232 and 2009-0328, State v. Lanier.

{¶ 2} This cause is remanded to the court of appeals for further consideration in view of our decision in State v. Johnson, 128 Ohio St.3d 153, 2010-Ohio-6314, 942 N.E.2d 1061.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
